item.title: Judge declines to unseal grand jury material in Jeffrey Epstein case
item.description: A federal judge in New York on Wednesday declined the federal government's request to unseal grand jury material in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

item.title: North Carolina working to secure shoreline ahead of Hurricane Erin
item.description: Preparations are underway in North Carolina's Outer Banks as Hurricane Erin threatens coastal flooding on its projected path up the East Coast. CBS Ne...

item.title: Texas Democrats seek ways to undo Republican redistricting effort
item.description: Texas Democrats are exploring other ways of undoing the Republican-led efforts to redistrict the state. This comes as the Texas House of Representativ...

item.title: 8/20: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Hurricane Erin triggers evacuations in North Carolina. Also, inside the generational decline in alcohol use.

item.title: Trump calls on Fed governor to resign after mortgage fraud allegations
item.description: President Trump called on Fed Governor Lisa Cook to resign on Wednesday after one of his appointees accused her of mortgage fraud.
